summary: EXHAUST/POSSIBLY CARBON MONOXIDE SMELL INSIDE PASSENGER AREA.  AFTER HEAVY ACCELERATION EXHAUST ODOR FILLS CABIN.  THIS HAPPENS EVERY TIME THERE IS A NEED FOR HEAVY ACCELERATION.  THIS HAPPENED SINCE THE AUTO WAS NEW.  I NOTICED ON A CNN REPORT THAT THIS ONLY HAPPENED ON POLICE VEHICLES.  THAT IS NOT THE CASE.  THIS IS NOT A POLICE VEHICLE.
